reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Sector-Wide Policy and Planning in Cambodia

description.narrative: The education sector is expected to play a key role in realizing this vision through producing of good and qualified human resources equipped with technical and intellectual skills which can response to the transform and modernizing of Cambodia's industrial structure from a labour-intensive industry to a skill-driven industry by 2025. To do so, having an Education 2030 Roadmap integrated with the Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) 4- Education 2030 targets could help guided the education governmental institutions, specifically the MoEYS, line ministries, DPs, CSOs and private sector for a stronger forces and resources mobilizing toward the strategic and programme implementation. The Cambodia's Education 2030 Roadmap development will be supported through the UNESCO CapED Program in 2017.
